com.buschmais.xo.impl.cache

Class TransactionalCache<Id>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buschmais.xo.impl.cache.TransactionalCache<Id>
  • Type Parameters:
    Id - The datastore id type.

    public class TransactionalCache<Id>
extends Object
    Transactional cache whcih handles read and write access to instances.

      • get

        public Object get(Id id,
                  TransactionalCache.Mode mode)
        Lookup an instance in the cache identified by its id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id.
        mode - The mode.
        Returns:
